notifications.title: 🚀 Samhiq Mailer v2.7 Released
notifications.message: Full PyQt5 version is now live! Enjoy new UI, attachment support, feedback system, logs, and much more.

notifications.title: 🔁 Auto Updater Enabled
notifications.message: The app now supports auto-update. New versions will be downloaded and installed seamlessly with one click.

notifications.title: 📎 Attachments Feature Added
notifications.message: Now attach multiple files to your bulk emails easily using the 📎 button on the Mailer tab.

notifications.title: 🔔 Notification System Live
notifications.message: You can now receive important updates and changelogs directly in the app under the Notifications tab.
